verses.name: Leviticus 15:14
verses.text: And on the eighth day he shall take to him two turtledoves, or two young pigeons, and come before the Lord unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, and give them unto the priest:

verses.name: Leviticus 15:15
verses.text: And the priest shall offer them, the one for a sin offering, and the other for a burnt offering; and the priest shall make an atonement for him before the Lord for his issue.

verses.name: Leviticus 15:16
verses.text: And if any man’s seed of copulation go out from him, then he shall wash all his flesh in water, and be unclean until the even.
